title: Patching takes forever!
body: The past several patches have taken a really long time to update.  Before they would take 10-15 minutes, and now it takes over an hour to patch for a similar sized patch as before.  Does anyone know what's going on?

replies.body: An update can vary depending on the health of your PC, and it's best to leave it be unless you are getting an error messages.  Stopping midway can force the patcher to scan all of your game files for any corruption before it restarts the update.  If you are having any issues let me know along with what percent on the patcher it's happening.  Let me know!
